message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it could greatly benefit your needs or interests. I am offering this unique opportunity to you for $150. I look forward to your consideration.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the details.  While I'm interested, $150 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Would you be willing to come down to $120?
